name: Attack of the Gooobers
description: Grab some friends or play alone and prepare to defend yourself from the Goobers in "Attack Of The Goobers!" Choose between multiple classes with unique abilities to survive the attack. Customize your characters stats and appearance to play how you like. Purchase weapons to defend yourself from the Goobers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP + Processor: Intel Atom CPU Z3735F 1.33GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / Radeon HD 2600 XT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Online Multiplayer Requires Internet
